group_1.narration: After Yachiyo got Tsuruno and I@dressed in our kimonos, the three@of us took a tea break together.
But then Felicia and Sana crashed in with@the most intense looks on their faces!

group_1.textRight: This was in the mailbox!
Oh? What do you have there?

group_1.narration: I know this is sudden, but I'll be holding a@New Year's party at my shop this afternoon.
I've prepared some special New Year's cuisine@but you're welcome to bring food or gifts♪
We'll pound mochi too! It'll be lots of fun!
I'll be waiting for you all!

group_1.textLeft: She did exactly what Tsuruno said she would.

group_1.textRight: Out of nowhere, too!
That's quite like Mitama...isn't it.
No way I'm goin'.
Did you skip over this part or somethin'?!
THIS part! "I've prepared some special New@Year's cuisine"!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100352:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oh, nice going, Felicia! "Cuisine" is a@really tough word to read on the first go!

group_1.textRight: Heh, that's nothin'! I can read all kindsa@words!
Wait, that's not the point!
Mitama's cookin' is way too dangerous to@put in your mouth!

group_1.textLeft: Did you have a bad experience with her?

group_1.textRight: Hell yes I did!
For some reason I can't remember what her@"Mitama Special" tasted like...
But I'll never forget how hard my poor@stomach struggled to handle it!

group_1.textLeft: But you'd get to do some mochi pounding! @Are you sure you don't want to go?

group_1.textRight: Ugh... [chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:100501:eyeClose_0][chara:100501:motion_0][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]It's waaay too risky. I can miss out@on that if I don't have to eat there!
Hmph!

group_1.textLeft: I really want us all to go to Mitama's party@together!

group_1.textRight: Are ya crazy?
Iroha, you're okay with putting your life on @the line if she serves her cooking?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I just think that we'll have a good@time if we all go, even so!

group_1.textRight: Havin' a good time won't make Mitama's@food any better.

group_1.textLeft: I'll go. Sana, Tsuruno, what do you want@to do?

group_1.textRight: I'm going! It sounds like fun!
I will too!
I've never been to a, um, New Year's party@before... I'm looking forward to it!
[chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: We'll just have to find a way to survive@Mitama's cooking and still have fun!

group_1.textRight: And how do ya plan on doin' that?
Just one... But I bet it'll work!
